column2: great food.  Made reservations for 915 on a Tuesday
column3: showed up about an hour early
column4: got a drink at the bar
column5: and promptly got seated early.  Ordered the ribeye
column7: and asparagus to share.  Everything came out SO quickly
column8: almost suspiciously quick. The food was delicious and devoured. I would come back to Chicago just for the ribeye.
